201.rule_description: Validates that the dataset contains the expected minimum number of records and meets data volume thresholds

202.rule_description: Ensures customer_id field is not null and properly populated in all transaction records

203.rule_description: Validates that transaction_date is in correct format, within valid range, and not in the future

204.rule_description: Checks that email addresses follow valid format patterns and contain required components

205.rule_description: Validates that payment amounts are within acceptable ranges, positive values, and have proper decimal precision
